docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This user guide provides instructions on how to design, build and run the network protocols bridges (NPB) and its digital twin (DT). Two use cases 01 & 02 demonstrates simulated applications of the NPB.

docs.title: Table of Contents
docs.text:
1. AAS Model design

    Intructions on designing an AAS model for NPB and NPB DT.

  2. Software Bridge generation

    Intructions on generating and configuring NPB.

  3. Digital Twin generation

    Intructions on generating and configuring AAS DT of NPB.

  4. Use case 01: Product Assembly Line

    Production Assembly Line use case description and deployment steps.

  5. Use case 02: Led Waterfall

    Led Waterfall use case description and deployment steps.

docs.title: Acknowledgements
docs.text: This document and its related resources are developed within the project TARGET-X : ROS6GBridge. The TARGET-X project has received funding from the Smart Networks and Services Joint Undertaking (SNS JU) under the European Union's Horizon Europe research and innovation program under Grant Agreement No 101096614.
